entry.value: WITH synonyms_agg AS (%%00010 SELECT%%00010 molregno,%%00010 syn_type,%%00010 array_agg(synonyms) AS synonyms%%00010 FROM molecule_synonyms%%00010 GROUP BY molregno, syn_type%%00010 ), alerts_agg AS (%%00010 SELECT%%00010 molregno,%%00010 alert_set_id,%%00010 array_agg(alert_name) AS alerts%%00010 FROM compound_structural_alerts csa%%00010 JOIN structural_alerts sa ON (sa.alert_id = csa.alert_id)%%00010 GROUP BY molregno, alert_set_id%%00010 )%%00010SELECT%%00010 md.molregno AS "molregno",%%00010 CASE md.availability_type%%00010 -- -1 appears in the data; let it go to NULL%%00010 WHEN 0 THEN 'discontinued'%%00010 WHEN 1 THEN 'prescription only'%%00010 WHEN 2 THEN 'over the counter'%%00010 END AS "availability_type",%%00010 (md.black_box_warning <> 0) AS "black_box_warning",%%00010 md.chebi_par_id AS "chebi_id",%%00010 md.chembl_id AS "chembl_id",%%00010 CASE md.chirality%%00010 -- -1 appears in the data; let it go to NULL%%00010 WHEN 0 THEN 'racemic mixture'%%00010 WHEN 1 THEN 'single stereoisomer'%%00010 WHEN 2 THEN 'achiral molecule'%%00010 END AS "chirality",%%00010 (md.dosed_ingredient <> 0) AS "dosed_ingredient",%%00010 md.first_approval AS "first_approval",%%00010 (md.first_in_class <> 0) AS "first_in_class",%%00010 md.indication_class AS "indication_class",%%00010 (md.inorganic_flag <> 0) AS "inorganic",%%00010 md.max_phase AS "max_phase",%%00010 md.molecule_type AS "molecule_type",%%00010 (md.natural_product <> 0) AS "natural_product",%%00010 (md.oral <> 0) AS "oral",%%00010 (md.parenteral <> 0) AS "parenteral",%%00010 (md.polymer_flag <> 0) AS "polymer",%%00010 md.pref_name AS "preferred_name",%%00010 (md.prodrug <> 0) AS "prodrug",%%00010 md.structure_type AS "structure_type",%%00010 (md.therapeutic_flag <> 0) AS "therapeutic",%%00010 (md.topical <> 0) AS "topical",%%00010 md.usan_stem_definition AS "usan_stem_definition",%%00010 md.usan_stem AS "usan_stem",%%00010 md.usan_substem AS "usan_substem",%%00010 md.usan_year AS "usan_year",%%00010 cp.mw_freebase AS "mw_freebase",%%00010 cp.alogp AS "alogp",%%00010 cp.hba AS "hba",%%00010 cp.hbd AS "hbd",%%00010 cp.psa AS "psa",%%00010 cp.rtb AS "rtb",%%00010 CASE cp.ro3_pass%%00010 WHEN 'Y' THEN true%%00010 WHEN 'N' THEN false%%00010 END AS "ro3_pass",%%00010 cp.num_ro5_violations AS "num_ro5_violations",%%00010 CASE cp.med_chem_friendly%%00010 WHEN 'Y' THEN true%%00010 WHEN 'N' THEN false%%00010 END AS "med_chem_friendly",%%00010 cp.acd_most_apka AS "acd_most_apka",%%00010 cp.acd_most_bpka AS "acd_most_bpka",%%00010 cp.acd_logp AS "acd_logp",%%00010 cp.acd_logd AS "acd_logd",%%00010 cp.molecular_species AS "molecular_species",%%00010 cp.full_mwt AS "full_mwt",%%00010 cp.aromatic_rings AS "aromatic_rings",%%00010 cp.heavy_atoms AS "heavy_atoms",%%00010 cp.num_alerts AS "num_alerts",%%00010 cp.qed_weighted AS "qed_weighted",%%00010 cp.mw_monoisotopic AS "mw_monoisotopic",%%00010 cp.full_molformula AS "full_molformula",%%00010 cp.hba_lipinski AS "hba_lipinski",%%00010 cp.hbd_lipinski AS "hbd_lipinski",%%00010 cp.num_lipinski_ro5_violations AS "num_lipinski_ro5_violations",%%00010 cs.standard_inchi AS "standard_inchi",%%00010 cs.standard_inchi_key AS "standard_inchi_key",%%00010 cs.canonical_smiles AS "canonical_smiles",%%00010 bt.helm_notation AS "helm_notation",%%00010 syn_rc.synonyms AS "research_codes",%%00010 syn_atc.synonyms AS "atc_names",%%00010 syn_ban.synonyms AS "ban_names",%%00010 syn_dcf.synonyms AS "dcf_names",%%00010 syn_enum.synonyms AS "e_number",%%00010 syn_fda.synonyms AS "fda_names",%%00010 syn_inn.synonyms AS "inn_names",%%00010 syn_jan.synonyms AS "jan_names",%%00010 syn_merck.synonyms AS "merck_index",%%00010 syn_nf.synonyms AS "national_formulary_names",%%00010 syn_other.synonyms AS "other_names",%%00010 syn_sys.synonyms AS "systematic_names",%%00010 syn_trade.synonyms AS "trade_names",%%00010 syn_usan.synonyms AS "usan_names",%%00010 syn_usp.synonyms AS "usp_names",%%00010 alert_glaxo.alerts AS "glaxo_alerts",%%00010 alert_dundee.alerts AS "dundee_alerts",%%00010 alert_bms.alerts AS "bms_alerts",%%00010 alert_pains.alerts AS "pains_alerts",%%00010 alert_surechembl.alerts AS "surechembl_alerts",%%00010 alert_mlsmr.alerts AS "mlsmr_alerts",%%00010 alert_inpharmatica.alerts AS "inpharmatica_alerts",%%00010 alert_lint.alerts AS "lint_alerts"%%00010FROM molecule_dictionary md%%00010LEFT JOIN compound_properties cp ON md.molregno = cp.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN compound_structures cs ON md.molregno = cs.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN biotherapeutics bt ON md.molregno = bt.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'RESEARCH_CODE'%%00010) syn_rc ON md.molregno = syn_rc.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'ATC'%%00010) syn_atc ON md.molregno = syn_atc.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'BAN'%%00010) syn_ban ON md.molregno = syn_ban.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'DCF'%%00010) syn_dcf ON md.molregno = syn_dcf.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'E_NUMBER'%%00010) syn_enum ON md.molregno = syn_enum.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'FDA'%%00010) syn_fda ON md.molregno = syn_fda.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'INN'%%00010) syn_inn ON md.molregno = syn_inn.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'JAN'%%00010) syn_jan ON md.molregno = syn_jan.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'MERCK_INDEX'%%00010) syn_merck ON md.molregno = syn_merck.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'NATIONAL_FORMULARY'%%00010) syn_nf ON md.molregno = syn_nf.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'OTHER'%%00010) syn_other ON md.molregno = syn_other.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'SYSTEMATIC'%%00010) syn_sys ON md.molregno = syn_sys.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'TRADE_NAME'%%00010) syn_trade ON md.molregno = syn_trade.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'USAN'%%00010) syn_usan ON md.molregno = syn_usan.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, synonyms FROM synonyms_agg WHERE syn_type = 'USP'%%00010) syn_usp ON md.molregno = syn_usp.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, alerts FROM alerts_agg WHERE alert_set_id = 1%%00010) alert_glaxo ON md.molregno = alert_glaxo.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, alerts FROM alerts_agg WHERE alert_set_id = 2%%00010) alert_dundee ON md.molregno = alert_dundee.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, alerts FROM alerts_agg WHERE alert_set_id = 3%%00010) alert_bms ON md.molregno = alert_bms.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, alerts FROM alerts_agg WHERE alert_set_id = 4%%00010) alert_pains ON md.molregno = alert_pains.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, alerts FROM alerts_agg WHERE alert_set_id = 5%%00010) alert_surechembl ON md.molregno = alert_surechembl.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, alerts FROM alerts_agg WHERE alert_set_id = 6%%00010) alert_mlsmr ON md.molregno = alert_mlsmr.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, alerts FROM alerts_agg WHERE alert_set_id = 7%%00010) alert_inpharmatica ON md.molregno = alert_inpharmatica.molregno%%00010LEFT JOIN (%%00010 SELECT molregno, alerts FROM alerts_agg WHERE alert_set_id = 8%%00010) alert_lint ON md.molregno = alert_lint.molregno
